tasks.description: Implement core functionality for: Implement a master-slave agent architecture where: 1) Master agent (Claude) orchestrates and monitors 2) Slave agents (OpenCode) execute specific tasks 3) Add inter-agent communication via the vector database 4) Implement agent hierarchy and role management 5) Create agent pooling for efficient resource usage 6) Add agent health monitoring and auto-restart 7) Build task queue with priority management 8) Add distributed task coordination

Create comprehensive tests for the new feature: Implement a master-slave agent architecture where: 1) Master agent (Claude) orchestrates and monitors 2) Slave agents (OpenCode) execute specific tasks 3) Add inter-agent communication via the vector database 4) Implement agent hierarchy and role management 5) Create agent pooling for efficient resource usage 6) Add agent health monitoring and auto-restart 7) Build task queue with priority management 8) Add distributed task coordination
